main event: An unknown object with a white light and two red blinking lights was observed while traveling on a moving train in Lock, Nevada.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 7 minutes and included vertical and horizontal movement of the object., The observer reported varying speeds and a drop in elevation of the object., The object appeared round in shape, about the size of a grapefruit, with reddish glow around it., The observation was made visually from the caboose of the train., The sighting occurred on a clear night with no unusual weather phenomena.
sighted object: an unknown round object emitting a white light and two red blinking lights
witness description: observer from the caboose of a train
